FuncDef: The reset vlan statistics command clears statistics about sent and received VLAN packets. The reset vlan statistics command clears statistics about sent and received VLAN packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VLAN in which packet statistics are cleared.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

ExtraInfo: Before collecting traffic statistics of an interface in a specified VLAN within a period, run the reset vlan statistics command to clear existing traffic statistics.
